Reviews.Content: husband recently spent five nights booked location price offered hotels website stay initially standard double balcony looking palau guell main firstly deemed nonsmoking reeked smoke secondly found noise street below irritating trying sleep people yelling smashing bottles 3am noise bounces narrow street complained staff accommodating switched twin beds pushed balcony hotel funnily sign saying smoking permitted ashtray didnt smell smoke quiet night happy wed quiet fancy view breakfast included stay plentiful didnt enjoy coffee juice bread etc quality try hot foods offer eggs husband liked pastries bothered return towels smelled strongly bleach beds extremely firm enjoy pillows uncomfortably bathrooms ventilate steam fans little window onto strange dark shaft overall recommend hotel staff location recommend staying street noise smell smoke luckily resolved
